page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Mr. Needham employs two people and the houses are mostly built out of chalk flint and red brick .It only takes 3 months to build a house and he was first interested when he was nine . Mr. R Wright employs 10 people to work for him. His houses are mostly built of red brick and he also builds swimming pools. Mr. Siddle does not employ anyone and only does small alterations. Mr. Rawson took up building after one of his relations and has been doing it for many years. He builds the houses out of brick. Survey of houses that Thornham children live in. Out of 15 people 11 lived in brick houses 1 person lives in a brick painted house 2 other people live in a flint brick and chalk house. 9 people live in detached houses and
